thread.title: Think return on retirement, not return on investment, says David Bach

title: Think return on retirement, not return on investment, says David Bach
text:
Think return on retirement, not return on investment, says David Bach 8:23pm BST - 06:19 
The co-founder of AE Wealth Management and author of ''Smart Couples Finish Rich'' tells Reuters' Fred Katayama retirees in their sixties should spend some money and enjoy their Golden Years while they're young enough to travel and move. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The co-founder of AE Wealth Management and author of "Smart Couples Finish Rich" tells Reuters' Fred Katayama retirees in their sixties should spend some money and enjoy their Golden Years while they're young enough to travel and move.
